headline: Weekly Dividend ETF COIW Pays 52 Times Per Year But 100% Return of Capital Raises Red Flags for Retirees
summary: The Roundhill COIN WeeklyPay ETF (NYSEARCA:COIW) offers 52 dividend payments per year, a huge improvement over the quarterly payments of most ETFs, and a newer cohort of monthly yield options. Launched in February 2025, COIW targets weekly distributions while providing 120% leveraged exposure to Coinbase Global (NASDAQ:COIN) through total return swaps. However, more frequent income ... Weekly Dividend ETF COIW Pays 52 Times Per Year But 100% Return of Capital Raises Red Flags for Retirees
